personal_info.headline: President and Founder at Mercalimentos Consultores
personal_info.name: Raul Caballero
personal_info.summary: Mercalimentos Consultores is an InternationalTrade and Marketing Public Relations Firm thatworks in coordination with the FAS-USDA, USEmbassy in Mexico to promote US Food andAgricultural Products to Mexico and rest ofLatin America. 25 yeas in business helping Agtrade between USA and Mexico. Im the countryDirector and Representative for the US Dry BeanCouncil, USA Dry Pea and Lentil Council, USASunflower Association, USA Popcorn Board, FoodExport Association Midwest and Northeast (20states) for the last 25 years.
